Heres some help for installing.
STEP 1
============
 > Unzip the ISO file
============

-you will get a folder with a CD1 image, and CD2 image)

STEP 2
===============================
> Run a program such as Alcohol 120%
> Mount the CD1 image on the virtual drive.
> Run the installation
===============================

STEP 3
===============================
> When prompted for CD2, remove whatever is on the virtual drive, and add the CD2 image onto the virtual drive, and press OK.
===============================

You can do it other ways, but thats how I did it.

Menno2 i can't mount whole "Need for Speed - Underground 2 [v1.2 PC-Multilang NoCD] - CD1.iso" -folder with daemon.. but if thats the .ISO file... HOW I CAN MOUNT IT?????

> but if thats the .ISO file... HOW I CAN MOUNT IT?????
Easy. Just left click on DT-icon in systray. In menue click on "Device 0". In appearing fileselectorbox search for the path, where you extract the files. Then click on ISO-file and OK. That's it! Now you have mount the image and can use it like a "normal" drive. Of course, you must select this (virtual) drive in Explorer, before you use that contents.
Now, you will ask me, which drive is the right one? Noob, you have seen it before in DT-menue (the drive letter stands after "Device" in brackets)! ;)
